channel.title: Npc Training
channel.description: Ok I'm currently working on a source as you see in my signature. I would like to make my server npc training, but I can't find a tut anywhere on how to do this. What do you suggest I do and does anyone know how?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2007, 04:03:28 PM[/size][hr]It would really help out if someone could answer =/. Hardly anyone has looked at this lol.

item.title: Npc Training
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Just add NPC’s and make sure you have working combat skills and your done… No tut needed

Read full topic

Dodian is also good.
